changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "user" ( user_id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, user_code CHAR(9) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password TEXT NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, citizen_id VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL UNIQUE, first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, phone_number VARCHAR(20), email VARCHAR(100), gender VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL, role VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL );
